summary: This bill, HR 3419, aims to reauthorize the telehealth network and telehealth resource centers grant programs. It amends the Public Health Service Act to specify funding of $42,050,000 for each fiscal year from 2026 to 2030. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on May 14, 2025, by Mr. Valadao and Mr. Gray, and was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
